review: The line goes out every two months or soh and I have to troubleshoot which is time-consuming. I had to call today and spent over 45 minutes with the chat persona who finally resolved its I do not like that it is happening too many times usually go without the phone for a week or longer because I don't have the time to call or troubleshoot.This time I went without a phone for a week and a half
I was able to order the service and hardware and install it in a different State of the use My Dad had a difficult time using a cell phone so this phone was perfect for him
ism only get three rings to get to the phone before it hangs up and when I dial the phone I got to be quick or it goes to a recording

Community phone has an awful product I have called multiple times to get things corrected and they say they will fix but they do not follow through My elderly parents have a voicemail that they set up the still says the caller has reached a different number than the one dialed Added an international option was a nightmare and still does not work with the new six cards

A person answered the phone initially I was able to get my questions answered and move forward to serviced I have an equipment issue after pig was received and I was able again to reach a person to help me solve the problem The Community Phone team has stayed with me for complete resolution

I responded to this same survey a couple of weeks ago and with my thoughts and concerns about your phone serviced I did not hear back regarding the issues I outlined I need caller ID with the name and phone number of the caller to show on my phone dashboards if the call goes to my voice mail I want to be able to retrieve the name and phone number of the callers

to have all of your people on the same page so that I wouldn't have had to make 5 calls in order to get my landmine fixed we had to go almost 3 months without a phone and that wasn't acceptable and after all of those calls the nth person was able to help
As a senior that is not so lech savvy the associates that worked with me via phones were very patient and completed my setup
I liked the fact that my request was handled immediately but when you responded it was to someone named "Gregory" I think not Earnestine.

I have had to call the company a few times since I switched to this service for many small issues and each time the lech person that helped me was always patient in explaining how to make the corrections to the base which worked
Just didn't work at this location or in our home Gave it 10 months Had to reset it continuously and still was 80% inoperable
They answered all of my questions and were prompt delivering the box for my landmine phones
They walked me through the steps I had to take to reset the phone and told me how to do it in the future if it should happen again
After several minutes of conversations a beeping sound starts and continues while causing my phone calls to be dropped
Your employees were able to completely fixed the problem with our phone and had been working perfectly since
Blocking kobo calls is greats I just wish that the community phone included extensions

hive just gotta say 5 stars for community phone because so far every time hive reached out to theme I get nothing but friendly people who are always there for me and willing to helps hive been a customer for just over 1 year now and will continue to stay with theme and I have the same coverage I had with 1 of those other companies but more expensive and harder to get customer service responses
The rep assisted me with getting my name added to show on caller ids
The agents were prompt in providing answers and service to deal with my concerns
The same things I wrote on my last review How often do I have to do this???
